channel.title: [FIX] Change Aspect Ratio
channel.description:
I had this pretty common issue([url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=12940&highlight=aspect+ratio']1[/url] [url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=13180&highlight=aspect+ratio']2[/url] [url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=12789&highlight=aspect+ratio']3[/url] [url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=13004']4[/url]).
[b]FIX[/b]
[b]1[/b]-Right-click on black mesa title under the Library in Steam and select Properties.
[b]2[/b]-Click on set launch options
[b]3[/b]-Write -w <width> -h <height> in the text field, where <width> and <heigth> are respectively your screen width and height.
[b]4[/b]-Run Black Mesa and have fun!
If you don't know your res, you can find it in control panel->Screen or checking in your Gpu software.
